overview: Alfred Hobbs, 84, drives across America in an ancient London taxi to find the once love of his life, who he left 40 years earlier. In the 1950s they made a 4 year global road trip in that very taxi.
tagline: Feature documentary chronicling a manâ€™s journey to reconnect with his estranged wife in the taxi that brought them together decades earlier.
title: Alfred and Jakobine
